item.title: Prometheus Alert Manager
item.description: The Prometheus Alertmanager handles alerts sent by client applications such as the Prometheus server. It takes care of deduplicating, grouping, and routing them to the correct receiver integration such as email, PagerDuty, or OpsGenie. It also takes care of silencing and inhibition of alerts. To ensure that alert messages get delivered it's a good idea to run several alertmanager processes clustered together, so in this example we will deploy 2 on different machines
